snippet.title: Sonic World DX - Version 1 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
UPCOMING VIDEO: DONT EXPECT LINKS UNTIL THE PREMIERE IS FINISHED!

On September 2nd, Version 1 will finally release! Don't cry about it because its a premiere, laugh because we asked you to!

Downloads will come up after the premiere:
Google Drive (1.0.10): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-umvZGs92_h-a1oaWq9752DA3HXDCGsp/view?usp=sharing

MediaFire (1.0.10): https://www.mediafire.com/file/3fc9ziy88bq820j/Sonic_World_DX_-_Version_1.zip/file

MEGA (1.0.00): https://mega.nz/file/ZCxA2a4Z#JtTMlZ01LQpVzwSMl04aDVTB0DgaDzzfXqucZIaSVLY

Press Kit: https://drive.google.com/file/d/13SSB3QQPqNUJMiLIpD7zFCGm7Xd8ojQI/view?usp=sharing
----------------------------------------
[The Sonic World DX Twitter]
https://twitter.com/SonicWorldDX

[The Sonic World DX Server]
https://dc.railgun.works/sonicworlddx

[The Sonic World Website]
https://sonicworldfangame.com/

Please refer to the FAQ before leaving any questions.
https://youtu.be/6s0lqlQQLPQ

Sonic World is a fan game geared towards the Adventures and Heroes fans. It is a very advanced enhancement of the BlitzSonic framework, pushing it to the limits.

The game is also very customizable to make everything from the ui, characters or stages to your fitting.

One of the game’s focuses is characters. We have tried our best to bring uniqueness and fun with a crazy amount of 40+ playable characters. They are all individual with a certain set of shared moves.

The game is looking to mix the best of Sonic games altogether along with new ideas.

We hope you enjoy the game and its content!
_______________________

All characters and materials in relation to the Sonic the Hedgehog game series are copyrights and trademarks of SEGA. This product has been developed without the permission of SEGA, therefore it's prohibited to sell and make profit of it (some people need to hear that more than others).

Note that all things may be subject to change!
